content: plaid toque created by lisa overby cute plaid toque knits up quickly with any dk weight yarn three sizes to fit the whole family ©2020 yarn twisters 1 plaid toque materials & info abbreviations yarn 2 skeins estelle double knit 250m 273 cdd - slip 2 stitches as if to k2tog knit 1 pass 2 slipped yards /100 g 50% acrylic 40% wool 10% nylon stitches together over the knit stitch 2 stitches de- colour 1 c1 black q65505 creased colour 2 c2 white q65501 co - cast on gauge 30 sts by 27 row equal 4 by 4 in 1 x 1 rib k - knit with smaller needles after blocking k2tog - knit 2 together insert needle into the next 2 needles 4 mm us 6 16 circular needles 4 5 mm sts knit the 2 sts together as one 1 st decreased us 7 16 circular needles 4 5 mm us 7 double p - purl pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge round - round notions stitch marker darning needle pom pom optional st/sts - stitch/stitches finished sizes measurements taken unstretched baby/toddler 8 tall 13 circumference youth/ ladies small 9 25 tall 14 circumference ladies large/men 11 tall 16 circumference pattern instructions with smaller needles and c1 co 80 100 120 sts join round 8 repeat round 6 to knit in the round careful to not twist your sts place round 9 repeat round 7 marker to denote the beginning of the round round 10 repeat round 6 ribbing all sizes for all sizes k1 p1 rib for approximately 1 5 2 2 5 inches switch repeat rnds 1 to 10 two more times proceed to de- to larger needles knit 1 round creases and finishing for the appropriate size main body charted instructions on page 3 baby/toddler decreases and finishing round 1 *with c1 k5 with c2 k1 with c1 k1 with c2 k1 with c1 k1 with c2 k1* repeat to end of round round 1 *with c1 k5 with c2 k1 with c1 k1 with c2 k1 with c1 k1 with c2 k1* repeat to end of round round 2 *with c1 k6 with c2 k1 with c1 k1 with c2 k1 round 2 *with c1 k1 cdd k1 with c1 k1 with c2 cdd with c1 k1* repeat to end of round with c1 k1* repeat until end of round 48 sts round 3 repeat round 1 round 3 *with c1 k4 with c2 k1 with c1 k1* repeat to round 4 repeat round 2 end of round round 5 repeat round 1 round 4 *with c1 cdd with c2 cdd* repeat until end round 6 *with c1 k1 with c2 k1 with c1 k1 with c2 k1 of round 16 sts cut c2 with c1 k1 with c2 k5* repeat to end of round round 5 with c1 k2tog to end of round 8 sts round 7 *with c2 k1 with c1 k1 with c2 k1 with c1 k1 cut
